__e: Why do you grieve so much for one you cannot even remember?
Do you think I'm full of shame and regret for what I've done now, Sister?
Well, you know, you never regretted it last time, so I... again, what is different now?
Among other things, sobriety and regret are anxiously waiting up for you.
Whichever way this goes, no regrets, okay? No looking back.
I have no time for regrets and no time for secrets.
All that stuff about living with regret, looking at yourself in the mirror, blah, blah, blah.
When I Iook in the mirror, I wish I'd given you more.
But I don't want you to regret not giving her a proper good-bye.
